title: (x) sans w/ large x-height on Livestream.com - Museo Sans {Florian}
content:
Hi Y’ll, was wondering you might be able to help me identify the main font on Livestream - For example on [http://www.livestream.com/browserwarning/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100109023028/http:/www.livestream.com/browserwarning/ "http://www.livestream.com/browserwarning/") The logo, black message title text, and the blue buttons.

Any help is appreciated.

Thanks much.
author: Jescro

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100109023028im_/http:/typophile.com/files/museo_5504.png)

Hi John,  
welcome to Typophile!  
That’s [Museo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20100109023028/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/museo-sans/) by [Jos Buivenga](http://web.archive.org/web/20100109023028/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jos%252BBuivenga).  
F
